div.p:
Curia Balliuorum de Aberdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem vndecimo die
mensis Marcij Anno Dominj et cetera quingentesimo nono

The said day thomas craufurd grantit that he had gottin and ressauit tua
franche crovnys one the name' and behalf of margaret Smyth fra hew mertin
portar of the feir

The said day It was deliuerit be ane suorne assis' cuthberd' Jhonsoun'
forspekar that the borgh' fundin be Dauid mar vppoun' thomas meldrum
for the wranguis' withhaldin fra him of xiiij s' et cetera was of nain awaile
for the quhilkis the said Dauy mar was in amerciament of the court And till amend'
as law will

The said day the bailyeis assignit this day viij dais to Dauid mar till
ansuer to the borgh' fundin one him be Thomas meldrum for the wranguis'
withhalding fra him of ane goldin gulding quhilk he tuk fra ane seruand'
of his

Curia balliuorum burgi de abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xv die mensis
marcij anno quo supra

The saide day george talyour lauchfullie warnit callit and nocht comperit tile
ansuer to the borghe' fundin one him be Jonhne arthour for the wranguis'
withaldin fra him of xiij li' vj s' viii d' et cetera tharfor the balyeis chargit Normand'
of leslie officiar' to pas and tak ane distres' fra the saide george and lat It
agane to the borghe' and it be askit and warne the saide george to comper
in the next hede court of the saide burghe to be haldin within the said' tolbutht
one monunday the aucht day of the monetht of aprile next to Cum tile
ansuer to the saide borghe as Secund' day of process'

Burgenses et fratres gilde facti anno Domini Millesimo quingentesimo nono tempore prepositure
gilbertj menyeis

Robertus edindeache recipitur in liberum burgensem et fratrem gilde ac Soluet decanis gilde
quatuor li' monete scocie prestito Solito Juramento
Thomas gray recipitur in liberum burgensem et fratrem gilde prestito Solito Juramento ac soluet decanis
gilde quatuor marcas et cetera
Tercio die mensis Junij Anno Dominj millesimo quingentesimo decimo Nobilis ac
potens dominus henricus dominus de sancto claro recipitur in liberum
burgagium huius burgj prestito solito Juramento
Johannes Stevin gener thome Wodman ad requestum venerabilem et egregij virj
magistri Robertj elphinstone rectoris de Kincardin recipitur in liberum burgensem et
fratrem gilde prestito Solito Juramento et Solito v s' in alba bursa

Curia Balliuorum de Aberdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem decimo octauo die
mensis marcij Anno Domini et cetera quingentesimo nono

The said day James strachin allegeit that Dauid grig was the caus' of the strublance of
his hous'

The said day copnaman skipper oblist him that quhat the sek of skinnis pertening to Alexander
King being in his schip was werrit throu him quhat that sex suorne' marchand
men that salis in the said schip maid quhat thai war werrit quhene thai cum to zeland
in the said skipparis defalt he suld' recompens It to the said alexander

The said day Androu Durty tailyeour was in amerciament of the court be his avin
toung grant for strublance of James strathachinis hous his wif and seruandis

The said day Dauid grig was maid quyt be ane suorne assis' ser Johnne ruthir
forspekar of the strublance of James strathachinis hous his wif and seruandis and
of alexander horne And' of the awaytakin of the said alexander hornis hat and knyf

The said day margaret hay the wif of Will smyth grantit that scho had
iiij elne of carsay of maly rudis in wed' of xj d' and j ob'

The said day Dauid mar younger burges of the said burgh' follovit and'
persewit copnaman skipper for xl s' vsuale money of scotland aving to him
the quhilk the said copin denyit And thareftir the said Dauid referrit and gef the preif
of the said xl s' to the said copinnis aitht Quhilk riplie auisit the greit
aitht suorne deponit and declarit in his conscience and saule that he aucht na money
to the said Dauid for the quhilkis the said copin was maid quyt of the said
Dauidis chalang of the said Sowme

The said day the prouest balyeis Counsale and Communite of the saide burghe'
opinlie warnit chargit and gathtreit be the premunicioun and warning of the common
handbill throw the haile Circualie Inquerit be the balyeis and officiaris ale in
ane voce concordand' grauntit consentit and ordanit to Seile ane Chartir of ane
wast land set in feuferme be sere Dauid Waus Chaplane and mastir of Sanct
thomas hospitale and chapile with thar common Seile to george bysset as
patronis tharto becuas' thai considerit the said Wastland Set for profit of the
said chapell

head.add: Expens' gevin to Johnne of mar to pas' for defence of the summondis anens the girssome of the salmond'

div.p:
The xxtj day of the monetht of marche the yer of god jM vC and nyne yeris
The prouost bailyeis and counsaile ordanit patry leslie mastir of the kirk
werk to deliuer to Johnne of mar five pundis of sanct nicholes bred' money tile
his expens' to pas' tile Edinburgh' for the defens of the summondis maid apoun' the
custum of the salmond' And ordanit Duncan colisone ane of the denis of gild'
to pas' to thame that has takis of the wattiris that has nocht gevin tile him na money
obefor and ressaue the said v li' fra thame And pay the said patry and gif
thai refus' and will mak him na pament to ger thaim to comper
befor the prouost and bailyeis and counsale agane friday

Curia balliuorum burgi de abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xxij die mensis marcij anno
quo supra

The saide day leonarde flemyn in Copin Amannis schip was in Amerciamentis of the court
be his avne toung graunt for the brekin of the kingis warde and for tribu
lance of William scrimgeour officiar' et cetera and tile amend' as law wile and forber'
in tyme to Cum et cetera Ande alexander malisone Come Souerte tile entir the saide leonarde
one the morne befor the prouest and balyeis tile vndirlie thar ordinance and the consale
for the said' offence

The said' day Alexander nory Come law borghe for that thome talyour and his wyf that jok ellene salbe skathles
of thame al wais bot as the cours' of common law wile

Eodem die gilbertus Ridale conuictus fuit per assisam ex ore Andree fyf prelocutoris eiusdem
pro perturbio Isabella nory et dicta Isabella conuicta fuit pro perturbio filie thome
ridale and quilibet eoram alteri emendabit ut Jura volunt et cetera

The xxvj day of the monetht of marche the yer' of gode jM and tene yeris
the prouest balyeis Counsale and Communite of the saide burghe' warnit be
the handbell throu the haile toune and gatherit and Circualy Inquerit Chesit maid'
and ordanit Johne of mar' and Alexander gray conburges of the said' burghe thar procuratouris
actoris and factoris to pas' befor our souerane lord and the lordis of his Counsale
to defend' the summonce maid' one the haile toune for the Custome of the salmond'
and ordanit to Seile ane prouratorj vndir thar common Seile and ane vthir lettir
of pouer to compone and aggree with our Souerance lordis hienes vndir the commoun'
Seile and deliuer the samyn to thame And' ordanit Duncan Colisone dene of the
gild' to gif thame

Curia capitalis burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem octauo die
mensis aprilis anno Domini Millesimo quingentesimo decimo quo die Sectis vocatis
et curia affirmata absentes patent per gilbertum menyes prepositum Johannem
Colisone patricium leslie et Alexandrum menyeis tres balliuorum eiusdem et cetera

Eodem die Willelmus murray fecit constituit et ordanauit Johannem Kintor suum legittimum
procuratorem ad prosequendum Robertum murray alios Interesse habens pro crofto sibi assedato
per dictum robertum ac in omnibus aliis actionibus et causis ipsum tangens Agendum
prosequendum defendendum promittens de Rato et grato Cum potestate sub se vnum
et plures substituendum Cum ceteris clausulis necessariis et oportunis

The said' day Copin neman skippar of the feir' deponit the gret aithe that Androw
lousone Imput ane pok of Skinnis in his Schip within the port of abirdene
contening xxxx of Skinnis and nay mar' gudis in the said' Schip of his

The saide day Williame stile grauntit him aving to magis gichtane the relict of Cristj
prat fyfteane Schillingis vsuale money of Scotland quhilkis the
balyeis chargit him to pay within terme of law

The saide day Williame abirdour grauntit him pait of Sevin li' scottis money be
the handis of Johne blak in the name of Alexander abirdour his brothir

The saide day Androw smitht grauntit him aving to Androw craufurde xxix s' quhilkis
the balyeis chargit him to pay within terme of law

Eodem die accedens ad barram religiosus vir frag frater Johannes Arnot minister
domus sancte trinitatis de Aberdene et protestatus fuit in forma Juris pro vno annuo
redditu quinque solidorum vsualis monete scocie annuatim exeuntem et leuandum de tota
et integra terra vasta Jacobi pyot Jacente in vico viridi dictj burgj ex australi
parte eiusdem inter terram alexandri gothra ex orientali et terram quondam Johannis
torrileitht ex occidentali et communionem viam regiam versus boream Ad quam terram
accedens nichil reperit distringibile preter terram et lapides quos balliuis in sacculo
presentauit in curia primo tanquam tercio die huius processus Testibus patricio gordone pa
tricio arthour et Johanne cuk sergeando

Eodem die accedens ad barram discretus vir magister alexander bisset capellanus
perpetuus altaris sanctj sanguinis dictj burgi et protestabatur in forma Juris
pro ano annuo redditu quatuor solidorum monete scocie annuatim exeuntem et leuandum
de tota et integra terra vasta quondam thome glenmalvin Jacente in futy inter terram
quondam Johannis lamyntone ex borientali ex vna et terram altaris sancti leonardi
ex australi partibus ab altera le lynkis versus oriens et fluxum maris versus
occidens Ad quam terram accedens nichil reperit distringibile preter terram et lapides
quos balliuis in sacculo presentauit in curia tanquam tercio die huius processus Testibus
Willelmo Watsone Johanne fynne alexandro forbes and Johanne cuk sergeando

Eodem die accedens ad barram discretus vir dominus Johannes Waus collector
capellanorum collegij ecclesie beati nicholaij dicti burgj et protestatus fuit in forma
Juris per vno annuo redditu vigintj solidrum vsualis monete scoci annuatim
exeuntem et leuandum de tota et integra terra vasta quondam domini Thome hervy
Jacente infra dictum burgum in vico Nauium ex boreali parte eiusdem vici inter
terram quondam andree lamyntone ex occidentali ex vna et terram Johannis
malisone ex oientali et communionem viam regiam versus austrum Ad quam terram
accedens nichil reperit distringibile preter terram et lapides quos balliuis in
sacculo presentauit in curia tanquam secundo die huius processus Testibus patricio gor
done patricio arthour et Johanne cuk sergeando

head.add: processus ministri Sancte trinitatis de terra supradicta

div.p:
Eodem die accedens ad barram relegiosus vir frater Johannes arnot minister domus
sancte trinitatis dictj burgi et protestatus fuit in forma Juris pro vno annuo redditu
quatuor solidorum monete scocie annuatim sibi et dicto loco debito de quadam terra
vasta quondam domini Thome hervy Jacente in vico Nauium dicti burgum apud
dictum locum sancte trinitatis inter terram quondam Andree lamyntone ex occidentali
et terram Johannis malisone ex orientali et communionem viam regiam versus austrum
Ad quam terram accedens nichil reperit distringibile preter terram et lapides quos
balliuis in sacculo presentauit in curia tanquam secundo die huius processus Testibus
vt supra

Eodem die accedens ad barram circumspectus vir magister Dauid nicholsone pro
curator et eo nomine domini Johannis stirueling capellanj perpetui altaris
beate Katherine virginis infra eccelsiam parrochialem beati nicholaij dicti burgj
situati et protestabatur in forma Juris vt moris est burgorum pro vno annuo red
ditu quinque solidorum vsualis monete scocie sibi domino Johannj et dicto altarj
a longo tempore debito et non soluto de quadam terra vasta quondam Jacobi pyot
pertinenciis Jacente in vico viridi dictj burgj inter terram alexandri gothrasone ex orientali
et terram quondam Johannis Torreletht ex boreali Ad quam terram accedens Idem
procuratour cum testibus suprascriptum nichil reperit distringibile preter terram et lapides
quos balliuis in sacculo presentauit in curia tanquam primo die huius processus
Testibus patricio gordone patricio arthour et Johanne cuk sergeando

head.add: processus capellanroum de aberdene de terra thome og

div.p:
Eodem die accedens ad barram discretus vir dominus Johannes Waus collector
ac procurator capellanorum de abirdene et protestabatur in forma Juris pro vno annuo
redditu sex solidorum et octo denariorum vsualis monete scocie dictus capellanis annuatim
debito de quadam terra vasta quondam thome og Jacente infra dictum burgum in vico castrj
extra portam borealem eiusdem inter terram Johannis Wilyongsone ex occidentali Et communiones
vias regias versus austrum et boream Ad quam terram accedens nichil reperit distringibile
preter terram et lapides quos balliuis in Sacculo presentauit in curia tanquam
secundo die huius processus Testibus thoma moir Johanne Riche et andrea
naughtie sergeando

Eodem die accedens ad barram dominus Johannes Waus procurator ac collector
capellanorum collegij ecclesie perrochiali dictj burgi Et protestatus fuit in forma
Juris per vno annuo redditu decim solidorum vsualis monete scocie annuatim
exeuntem et leuandum de quadam terra vasta quondam philippi Dumbrek et Elizibeth
dakyr' cuis sponsa Jacente in vico inferiori dicti burgj inter terram Johannis
malisone ex occidentali ex vna Et terram andree meldrum ex bo orientali
partibus ab altera terram quondam patricii stiklok versus austrum et terram anterioris
sancte Anne versus boream Ad quam terram accedens nichi reperit distringibile
preter terram et lapides quos ballivis in sacculo presentauit in curia tanquam
secundo die huius he processus Testibus vt supra

Eodem die accedens ad barram honestus vir Duncanus craik burgensis
dictj burgj et protestatus fuit in forma Juris pro vno annuo redditu sex
solidorum vsualis monete scocie sibi annuatim debito de quadam terra vasta
quondam Willelmi froster Jacen in futy inter terram thome bryane ex
boreali ex vna Et communionem viam regiam qua Itur ad ecclesiam sancti
clementis versus austrum Et le lynkis versus oriens Ad quam
terram accedens nichil reperit distringibile preter terram et lapides quos
balliuis in sacculo presentauit in curia tanquam secundo die huius processus
Testibus thoma moir Johanne Riche et Andrea nachtie sergeando

The saide day george tailyour lauchfullie warnit Callit and nocht Comperit
tile ansuer to the borghe' fundin one him be Johne arthour' for the wrang
uys' withhaldin fra him of xiij li' vj s' et viij d' tharfor the balyeis chesit
Williame scrimgeour officiar' to pas and tak ane distres of the saide georgis
and latt it to borghe' and it be askit and warne him to Comper this day xv
dais tile ansuer to the said' burghe as thride day of process'
